content: designed for one skein of fingering weight yarn this ponchette is just the thing for those days when an extra light layer is all you need finished dimensions 20 x 41 before seaming yarn yarn and soul superfine 400 or 400 yards of light fingering weight yarn note if substituting yarn select one that can hold the blocked shape hook 3 5mm e hook gauge the stitch will drastically change and open up with blocking pre-blocked gauge is 4 shells and 12 row = 4 square
